titleStmt.title: The Mother and daughter, or, A dialogue betwixt them composed in verse, if you will attend, I will rehearse ... The tune is, Come sweet-heart and embrace thine own: or, The dancing of Primrose-hill.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, neer the Hospital-gate, in West-Smith-field.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Golden-Ball, neer the Hospital-gate, in West-Smith-field.
